results.content:
I have been able to learn how to to build the user role without packages

Although  I am still finding difficult to direct  each user role to a different pages .Example  User can be able to see the post only without edit

Admin can view all the pages eg comment ,post category and perform all action 

Moderator can view all but he cannot delete or update the content . 

It will be better Idea if u can include this type of course here .

Thank you for great course stay blessed

results.content: There is nothing about real roles. There is nothing about permissions AT ALL!!! One of the worse course on udemy about laravel. Teacher’s acknowledge is very poor. Simple things like add some migration, add some records manually and display something from one record - it’s a magic for him!! Don’t waste your money and time. There is nothing in this course from description!
